EmailTemplate.subject: Follow-up email to request a Reference for {!Reference__c.Applicant_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Reference__c.Name},
We recently sent you a reference request for who has applied to become a volunteer with RNIB Group. Please could you complete and return the reference to us within the next 7 days. Once the reference has been received we can continue with their recruitment.
If you have any questions regarding the reference please contact us on 01733 37 54 50 or volunteering@rnib.org.uk
Kind regards
RNIB Group Volunteering Team T: 01733 37 54 50 E: volunteering@rnib.org.uk W: www.rnib.org.uk
